version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Add basic send tooltip (maybe will improve) + Dim font color on tcp hidden tracks + Add settings menu (right click search filter, config stored in REAPER/Data folder) + Add option to display track color indicator (deafault: on) + Add option to keep script open after selection (default: off) + Add option to uncollapse actioned track if it's a folder (default: off) + Add options to unhide tracks in TCP/MCP after selection (default: TCP on, MCP off) + Add option to show track number (default: off) + Add help menu # Internal refactor (fetch track data on project update) # Avoid creating sends by dragging on arrange view # Fix close button if no matches or no tracks in project # Change first use window size # Increase font size by 1 px

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Add basic send tooltip (maybe will improve) + Dim font color on tcp hidden tracks + Add settings menu (right click search filter, config stored in REAPER/Data folder) + Add option to display track color indicator (deafault: on) + Add option to keep script open after selection (default: off) + Add option to uncollapse actioned track if it's a folder (default: off) + Add options to unhide tracks in TCP/MCP after selection (default: TCP on, MCP off) + Add option to show track number (default: off) + Add help menu # Internal refactor (fetch track data on project update) # Avoid creating sends by dragging on arrange view # Fix close button if no matches or no tracks in project # Change first use window size # Increase font size by 1 px

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Support receive creation (Cmd/Ctrl during drag and drop to switch source/destination) # Improve tooltip for drag drop routing

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Support sidechain send creation (Drag/Drop on FX Gui, send created on ch 3-4)

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Add option to hide script titlebar # Fix crash on startup (oops) # Sligthly round searchbar and color box # Fix searchbar resize logic

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: # Default to show script titlebar

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: # Fix incorrect Tree node id push

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Add option to show all parents of actioned track (default: on)

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Use Reaper's ROUTINGDRAG cursor while drag/drop routing (requires JS_Api)

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Make routing cursor optional (default: on if JS_Api is installed)

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: # Fix routing cursor option disabled if JS_API is installed after running script for the first time # Fix routing cursor not returning to normal after action

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: # Fix ImGui depencency check (thanks cfillion)

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Support adding track to selection with shift+double click or Shift + Enter + Support Cmd/Ctrl + 1-9 to select among first 9 search results + Support Shift + Cmd/Ctrl + 1-9 to select among first 9 search results # Fix project state change check

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Add (very bad) UI feedback when holding Cmd + Add option to dim track color name for tracks hidden in tcp (GUI submenu, default: on) # Fix hidden in tcp track tinting # Prevent performing selection with Cmd/ctrl + 1-9 while routing

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Add rudimentary support for Pre-Post Actions, defined insde the script.

version.author: smandrap
version.changelog: + Add rudimentary support for pre-post actions (default: disabled) # Display pre-post actions count in settings (that's exquisite UI work here lol)
